title: The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to NBA legend Jerry West about the passing of the late great Bill Russell. Browns writer Zach Jackson calls in to discuss the local reaction to Deshuan Watson getting a 6 game suspension. And Jeff Darlington discusses whether he thinks the league will appeal the length of the suspension.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
